2.0.0-alpha.name: web3-shh
2.0.0-alpha.description: Web3 module to interact with the Whisper messaging protocol.
2.0.0-alpha.readme:
# web3-shh

This is a sub module of [web3.js][repo]

This is the whisper v5 module.   
Please read the [documentation][docs] for more.

## Installation

```bash
npm install web3-shh
```

## Usage

```js
import {Shh} from 'web3-shh';

const shh = new Shh(
    'http://127.0.0.1:4546',
    null,
    options
);
```

## Types 

All the typescript typings are placed in the types folder. 

[docs]: http://web3js.readthedocs.io/en/1.0/
[repo]: https://github.com/ethereum/web3.js

2.0.0-alpha.1.name: web3-shh
2.0.0-alpha.1.description: Web3 module to interact with the Whisper messaging protocol.
2.0.0-alpha.1.readme:
# web3-shh

This is a sub module of [web3.js][repo]

This is the whisper v5 module.   
Please read the [documentation][docs] for more.

## Installation

```bash
npm install web3-shh
```

## Usage

```js
import {Shh} from 'web3-shh';

const shh = new Shh(
    'http://127.0.0.1:4546',
    null,
    options
);
```

## Types 

All the typescript typings are placed in the types folder. 

[docs]: http://web3js.readthedocs.io/en/1.0/
[repo]: https://github.com/ethereum/web3.js
